title: How is Selena Gomez such a bad singer but still popular? - Quora

response.answer_text: She gained her fan base on the Disney channel. She gained even more of a fan base when she was with Justin Bieber. And despite the fact you’re a “bad singer”, if you make a catchy song in 2018 that people can dance to or cruise easily to, you’re gonna he successful. So she’s got a massively loyal fan base who will go to all of her concerts and buy her music and merch etc. plus she makes the ideal type of music for climbing charts in todays pop. That’s all you need to be a successful pop star today.

Selena Gomez was a actress and then passed to a singer. I think Rappers like Travis Scott,A$AP Rocky,Young Thug,Post Malone,Future,Kendrick Lamar,and the Migos are the best. Selena Gomez sings pretty bad. And i just end this question by saying La Di Da Slob on me Knob,Pass me some syrup,Fuck me in the car, La Di Da Di Da,Mothafucka the Law.
